comment: You are the only person jiske sath me kabhi bore nahi ho skti cos somehow you ALWAYS have a gossip to share.🙃  From slapping each other real hard to being there for each other when needed the most, we have done it all❤️ (Call karte rehna kyuki me aalsi hu🫠)
name: Mitika Bhadada

comment: time bura chal raha hoga bro, vrna multi tasking is a easy task for you. Apni intern and Job hamehsa same date ko lagi h(5th december), Marathi bonds really works after all. 1st year se 4th year- bhot transformation dekha h tere me , always wishing best for you. bs logo ko thoda kam chheda kr😵

comment: You should be honored for being the first person whom I can effortlessly roast.Cheers to our bond! 🥂 But hey, congrats on being chosen first somewhere🙂Despite everything, you were always there.Your efforts and presence made every trip and outing memorable. Always rooting for your presence.✨
name: Aditi Mishra

comment: Thanks for making my college life fun. Bro knows how to hold a conversation & he gossips like there's no tomorrow. You failed at making me go to the gym & I failed at improving your English. P.S. Maggi me dudh nhi daalte 🤢
name: Dev Daftari

comment: Flatmate ban ne se leke..dunia bhar ki bkc...jitne kisi k ho skte voh saare phases dekh liye bhai tere..ahhi gym phase chl rh👍(bs ek cheez chod se..you know it😂). You got both bkc and emotional side bro.. making you the best...thanks for being there always.

comment:

tera naam  usme hamesha paunga ,
ki tha ek bhalu , thoda gandu sa ....
bas apni bkc ko yaad krke kabhi kabhi  mai bhi muskuraunga. ....
Words aren't enough  to thank bro for everything he did . 
A friend in need and a friend indeed !!!
ps. 7 baje

comment:

Laukar bhetuya BLR madhi!

comment:
Bhai bhale hi tera life ne bahut kaata ho, But tune kabhi meri dosti nhi kaati. My go to person when i am getting bored. Will miss those Gym sessions bhai, Gym chhodna mat saale, ek saal baad comparison krenge kiski body zyada bani. Will miss you bro👊
PS ; Haan bhai mai bahut bada M@#h@r^h*d hoon!

comment: Are yaar, voh bdmntn k "paree hu m" vale shots bahut miss krngi m hmesha, covid m apne online n offline dono discussions aur gossips m bhut maza aya. Overall, the most cheerful person of the clg. Labs n classes best! Squash seekh liya maine finally trese😂ATB bro!keep in touch! Squash when again?:-(

comment: Tu m or daksh, epic trio💀 khoob bkc Kari h sath m, Allen m bhi or college m bhi, cricket khelna, gossips, or apan teeno gym nahi kr sakte sath m naa kisiko krne de skte😂 All the best for everything going ahead and dost to hamesha rahenge🤝

comment: Aditya bro, gossip queen, sweet at heart,maze krne me sabse mast. comment: Time change hogya pr teri dp mujhe aaj bhi achi nahi lagti h. I realised ki problem camera, location ya photographer ka hai hi nhi🙃.I know aaplya madhatlya khup goshti badalya, but I always wish best for you. Bas chugli kam kiya karr ****🥱

comment:

comment: Only person jo merse v jyada cricket ko excited rhta tha 3rd sem m. I'll remember those dhup waali innings with u and all those late night gossips with our bunch (back then).
